title: Researchoo
author: Researchoo
created_time: February 09, 2023, 06:34:33 AMLast edit: February 09, 2023, 07:39:04 PM by Researchoo
content: citybuildtrade Is HYIP Investment website  Check review on trustpilot    citybuildtrade.comRegards Researchoo

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: They did a bounty campaign here on the forum and during that time I registered my telegram account with them and when they finally launched the project I received a $10 bonus which continue to accumulate 35% daily until 30 days (which is a month) at the end of everything I withdrew $10.5 from the website and they deducted $1 for fee resulting to the net amount of $9.5 (for a month). I never get to invest my own money because I wouldn't want to trust a project that has promised to keep giving me money everyday without me having to do anything for them. But I haven't seen anyone complained or open a scam accusation against them other than this one.

comments.author: holydarkness
comments.body: Quote from: Researchoo on February 09, 2023, 06:34:33 AMcitybuildtrade Is HYIP Investment website  citybuildtrade.com, as it appears to be a high-yield investment program (HYIP)which is often a scam that promises high returns with little to no risk.Avoid This Scam Do not invest  Regards ResearchooIsn't it a little bit double standard that you advised people to stay away from this platform --which, a sound advise, like it or not-- but you promoted and defended a similar business model that you don't even bother to clarify? What happened? Bitnaka paid you while citybuildtrade refused to do the same?

comments.author: sujonali1819
comments.created_time: February 09, 2023, 07:07:54 PMLast edit: February 10, 2023, 03:58:10 AM by sujonali1819
comments.body: Quote from: Researchoo on February 09, 2023, 06:34:33 AMcitybuildtrade Is HYIP Investment website  citybuildtrade.com, as it appears to be a high-yield investment program (HYIP)which is often a scam that promises high returns with little to no risk.Avoid This Scam Do not invest  Regards ResearchooQuoteCitybuildtrade.com Review Scam Or Legit If you can recognize that it's an HYIP, then just ignore it. Don't depend on any third-party review or rating, Don't try to the review is legit or Scam. If you don't ignore you are in danger and anytime you can fall into their trap. HYIP never be a Legit one. Today or tomorrow they will scam you it's 99.99% for sure.

comments.author: albon
comments.body: Quote from: holydarkness on February 09, 2023, 06:59:18 PMIsn't it a little bit double standard that you advised people to stay away from this platform --which, a sound advise, like it or not-- but you promoted and defended a similar business model that you don't even bother to clarify? What happened? Bitnaka paid you while citybuildtrade refused to do the same?LOL, This OP is really funny, he promotes Bitnaka which is a Ponzi project and its scam currency, I think he is part of this scam project, and today you find him posting to warn the community about Citybuildtrade.I do not know what motivated this OP to be contradictory, but perhaps he would like to use his intelligence to gain the trust of members because of his warnings for another project, but it was better for him, before posting his topic about the Citybuildtrade.com project, to reconsider the project that he promoted in cold blood to deceive traders that the project offers trading bots.As for Citybuildtrade.com, if we go to review sites such as Trustpilot, we will find many bad reviews about it as a scam platform, so yes, this is a scam project that we cannot trust.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: Quote from: Cantsay on February 09, 2023, 10:54:37 AMThey did a bounty campaign here on the forum and during that time I registered my telegram account with them and when they finally launched the project I received a $10 bonus which continue to accumulate 35% daily until 30 days (which is a month) at the end of everything I withdrew $10.5 from the website and they deducted $1 for fee resulting to the net amount of $9.5 (for a month). I never get to invest my own money because I wouldn't want to trust a project that has promised to keep giving me money everyday without me having to do anything for them. But I haven't seen anyone complained or open a scam accusation against them other than this one. it is not uncommon for an HYIP to do that. their goal is to attract as many investors as possible even if they have to sacrifice some amount of money in order to attract investors. there is no doubt that in the end, this HYIP investment scheme will just end up as a scam and people losing money from it.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: sujonali1819 on February 09, 2023, 07:07:54 PM9.999% for sure.I think there is a typo error it should be 99.99%Quote from: Saisher on February 09, 2023, 09:52:22 PMI supported the flag against OP he is very much involved in HYIP and Ponzi schemes now he tries to build up his tarnished reputation by reporting one HYIP site not even posting sorry for promoting a Ponzi schemeOne may work on a Ponzi scheme or promote one or more Ponzi but later the person can be realized that the person should not do that and changed his/her mind about the Ponzi scheme. I have seen several forum members who were promoted Ponzi but later become reputed for detecting scam. And build their reputation on the forum. They received negative but as they changed their minds negative changed to neutral. Or deleted previous feedback. So, op may try to do the same and if really that can then that will not be bad.

comments.author: Getmon
comments.body: You now seem to be promoting a different token. I would rather steer clear of that token, which has a very low volume. Regardless, you should either create a new topic about it or discuss it with existing topics at Altcoin Discussions or Trading Discussions topics. Mate, you stay on topic, which was your initial post about the Citybuildtrade scam. Additionally, you should explain why you are operating Bitnaka, an obvious Ponzi scheme. In fact, Bitnaka and Citybuildtrade are identical. They are both fraudulent ponzi schemes. There are numerous ways to make money. If you want to earn good karma, you need to stop defrauding others.

But later you are suggesting some or shilling some project in this scam accusation thread which makes no sense, to be honest. If you need such discussion you should create a topic in Bitcoin Forum > Alternate cryptocurrencies > Speculation (Altcoins) this section instead of shilling here.

comments.author: Andre Laporte
comments.body: I invested with them a small amount of 30 USDT and made 3% when the investment cycle was over.I did withdraw all my money without issues. Maybe I did not get scammed because it was a small amount

comments.author: holydarkness
comments.body: Quote from: Andre Laporte on April 29, 2023, 11:14:17 AMI invested with them a small amount of 30 USDT and made 3% when the investment cycle was over.I did withdraw all my money without issues. Maybe I did not get scammed because it was a small amountAnd you specifically created an account today just to made this testimonial? You must be feeling very grateful with this "small amount" of withdraw that you promoted them. But let's give you a benefit of doubts for a sec, just for the sake of future reference for anyone, that is how exactly a ponzi scheme works, the last person joined will be the one who lost everything.But... but... but... how? How did you withdraw? The site has been down for weeks

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: Andre Laporte on April 29, 2023, 11:14:17 AMI invested with them a small amount of 30 USDT and made 3% when the investment cycle was over.I did withdraw all my money without issues. Maybe I did not get scammed because it was a small amountFirst of all, it seems you are posting on behalf of them. You have created your account only to post a testimonial of them. You have not created any post before this one and also you have not created any post after this one.Let me think you are a legit person and you have no-connection with the site.You have invested a small fund so they may not scam and they may wait for a large amount. So, if you are a legit user then think twice about where you are investing.
